name: Smart Safety Alarm
description: Compact personal alarm with 130dB sound and LED light. Features one-click activation and durable construction.
usage_instructions: Press and hold the power button for 2 seconds to turn on
Pull the pin to activate the 130dB alarm instantly
Built-in LED light can be activated with a double-press
Alarm will sound continuously until pin is reinserted
Replace batteries when LED indicator turns red

name: GPS Safety Watch
description: Smartwatch with SOS button, real-time location tracking, and emergency contact alerts. Water-resistant and long battery life.
usage_instructions: Set up emergency contacts in the companion app
Press SOS button for 3 seconds to send emergency alert
Double tap screen to send location to trusted contacts
Swipe right for quick access to emergency services
Charge device when battery level drops below 20%

name: Defense Pepper Spray
description: Non-lethal self-defense spray with UV marking dye. Compact size fits in purse or pocket. Range up to 10 feet.
usage_instructions: Remove safety cap before use
Point nozzle away from yourself and towards threat
Press spray button firmly for 1-2 second bursts
Spray in a Z pattern for maximum effectiveness
Replace after expiration date or if partially used

name: Personal Safety Keychain
description: Multifunctional keychain with built-in alarm, LED light, and emergency whistle. Perfect for everyday carry.
usage_instructions: Attach to keys or bag for easy access
Press alarm button twice to activate siren
Hold light button for continuous LED illumination
Blow whistle firmly for emergency alert
Keep away from water and extreme temperatures
